wikipedia_page.main: George Reginald Bates (21 November 1923 – January 1995) was an English footballer who played on the wing for Darlington in the Football League. He was on the books of Sheffield Wednesday and Lincoln City without representing either in the League, and played non-league football for Gainsborough Trinity.

response: *George Bates (physician) (1608–1668), physician to Oliver Cromwell and to Charles II, Fellow of the Royal Society, author
*George Bates (wheelchair basketball) (born 1994), British wheelchair basketball player
